messages.subject: Unschooling Cruise in 2009!
messages.msgSnippet: Hiya, Folks! In case you haven t heard it through the grapevine yet, Dayna Martin has put together an incredible adventure for the fall of 2009.  It s an
messages.messageBody:
Hiya, Folks!

In case you haven't heard it through the grapevine yet, Dayna Martin
has put together an incredible adventure for the fall of 2009. It's
an Unschooling Adventure Cruise to Bermuda from October 24 to 29,
2009, and sails out of Bayonne, New Jersey. If you're interesting in
learning more about it, visit this blog that she's set up:

http://www.unschoolingadventurecruise.blogspot.com/

You can also join a yahoo group that she started for folks to be able
to talk about it:

http://groups.yahoo.com/group/UnschoolingAdventureCruise/

Wild, huh?

:-)

~Marji, never been on a cruise before but totally looking forward!

P.S. Apologies for the cross-posting.
